item.title: Vim配置
item.description: 安装Vim-Plug: curl -fLo ~/.vim/autoload/plug.vim --create-dirs https://raw.githubusercontent.com/junegunn/vim-plug/master/plug.vim 在~/.vimrc中配置插件： call plug#begin('~/.vim/plugged') Plug 'vim-airline/vim-airline' Plug 'scrooloose/nerdtree' Plug 'flazz/vim-colorschemes' Plug 'fatih/vim-go', { 'do': ':GoUpdateBinaries' } Plug 'Raimondi/delimitMate' call plug#end() colorscheme molokai map <F2> :NERDTreeToggle<CR> map <F3> :NERDTreeFind<CR> autocmd bufenter * if (winnr("$") == 1 && exists("b:NERDTree") && b:NERDTree.isTabTree()) | q
